PAD_TrapSpotted.synopsis: The player spots the trap in the aasimar survivor booster.
PAD_TrapSpotted.how_to_trigger: Approach 107.235; 7.23; -862.99 in SCL_Main and pass or fail the passive perception check.

PAD_DoorSpotted.synopsis: The player discovers a door to the hideout where an Aasimar Harper had survived longer than most would in the curse.

automatic_ordering.reasoning: Both sessions are triggered by the player exploring different locations and discovering separate elements in the game world. 'PAD_TrapSpotted' involves the player noticing a trap in the aasimar survivor booster, while 'PAD_DoorSpotted' involves discovering a door leading to a hideout. There is no explicit information in the provided synopses or triggers to indicate that one session must occur before or after the other, nor is there any indication that they are mutually exclusive. Therefore, no ordering or exclusiveness constraints can be definitively established from the given data.

PAD_TrapSpotted_1.speaker: Player
PAD_TrapSpotted_1.text: |Some runes on the floor over there.|

PAD_DoorSpotted_0.speaker: Player
PAD_DoorSpotted_0.text: Strange - the dust on the leftmost door has been wiped clean.
